title: Krystilia

properties.name: description
properties.value: Krystilia is a Slayer master found in Edgeville's jail north-east of the bank. When spoken to, she expresses her love for magic and the Wilderness, and claims the guards locked her in the cell for trouble-making.

content:
This article has a strategy guide here.
All information on mechanics and strategy will be on this page.
Krystilia
Released11 July 2013 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman
LocationEdgeville guardhouse
Sells itemsSlayer Equipment
GenderFemale
OptionsTalk-to, Assignment, Trade, Rewards
ExamineA witch who likes chaos - she looks dangerous!
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID7663

Krystilia is a Slayer master found in Edgeville's jail north-east of the bank. When spoken to, she expresses her love for magic and the Wilderness, and claims the guards locked her in the cell for trouble-making.

Players can speak to her to change their respawn point to Edgeville, after unlocking the feature for a one-time fee of 5,000,000 coins.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer
  • 2 Useful teleports
  • 3 Tasks
  • 4 Dialogue
  • 5 Changes
  • 6 Trivia

Slayer[edit | edit source]

She is a Slayer master who assigns the player monsters found within the Wilderness. Only kills within the Wilderness count towards her tasks. Before being assigned a Wilderness task, she will warn you that she will assign any monster regardless of your combat level.

In addition to this, killing monsters on her tasks can yield Larran's key, which can be used to open Larran's small or big chest, also found in the Wilderness. They act similarly to Konar quo Maten's brimstone keys and brimstone chest.

Tasks from Krystilia have a separate task completion counter to standard tasks. Players will have to complete a five Slayer task streak from her to begin earning Slayer reward points from Wilderness slayer tasks. Although they are counted separately, players cannot have a regular and Wilderness slayer task at the same time. If players do not want to do one of her tasks, they can speak to Turael in Burthorpe to have him give them another task; however, doing so will reset the player's Wilderness task streak (but not their normal Slayer task streak).

For a kill to count towards a Krystilia task, the player must be physically located inside the Wilderness when the monster's death occurs. A player who is using a Dwarf multicannon will receive the standard "As your slayer task is from Krystilia, you can only perform it inside the Wilderness" message if they teleport out of the Wilderness to restock and remain outside of it when their cannon kills the monster. The safe zone buffer immediately outside the Ferox Enclave counts as the Wilderness for task purposes, but the Enclave itself does not. Thus a player using the Pool of Refreshment to resupply will not receive credit for the kill if they are inside the Enclave.

Completion of a task assigned by Krystilia after the 5th task streak will grant:

Task interval Points given
Every task 25
Every 10th 125
Every 50th 375
Every 100th 625
Every 250th 875
Every 1,000th 1,250

Useful teleports[edit | edit source]

A detailed map of the Wilderness.
  • Edgeville - Fairy ring (code dkr), Amulet of glory, or Paddewwa Teleport
    • Edgeville Monastery - Combat bracelet
  • Corporeal Beast lair - Games necklace
  • The Forgotten Cemetery - Cemetery Teleport or Dareeyak Teleport
  • Burning amulet
    • Chaos Temple
    • Bandit Camp
    • Lava Maze
  • Graveyard of Shadows - Carrallangar Teleport
  • Demonic Ruins - Annakarl Teleport
  • Frozen Waste Plateau - Ice Plateau Teleport or Ghorrock Teleport
  • Fountain of Rune - Wilderness sword 4

Tasks[edit | edit source]

Out of all possible tasks, only bloodvelds, jellies, dust devils, nechryael, abyssal demons, and spiritual creatures require a Slayer level. In addition, the locations will only list those found within the Wilderness.

Monsters assigned by Krystilia have a chance to drop Larran's keys and Slayer's enchantments, which can be used to upgrade the Slayer's staff to a Slayer's staff (e).

  18. ↑ Only assigned to players who have unlocked Like a boss via spending 200 Slayer reward points.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 February 2022
(update)

Increased the weighting of the new Wilderness Slayer tasks from 3 to 5.

2 February 2022
(update)
  • Krystilia now assigns Abyssal Demons (75-125), Dust Devils (75-125), Jellies (100-150), and Nechryael (75-125)
  • Fire Giant task reduced from 100-150 to 75-125.
  • Hill Giant task reduced from 100-150 to 75-125.
  • Bloodveld task reduced from 90-140 to 70-110.
18 June 2020
(update)

The number of black knights north of Venenatis were increased from 2 to 7 and the number of bloodveld spawns in the Wilderness Dungeon were increased from 2 to 5.

30 April 2020
(update)

Bloodvelds, hill giants, moss giants, black knights, pirates and zombies were added to her list of tasks.

25 January 2018
(update)

Lesser demons were added to her list of tasks, as was previously stated in the newspost where she became a Slayer master.

23 November 2017
(update)

Chaos druids were added to her list of tasks, as was previously stated in the newspost where she became a Slayer master.

13 April 2017
(update)

Krystilia was made into a Slayer master and she was given a name. Previously, she was simply known as "Witch".

11 July 2013
(update | poll)

A witch has been added in Edgeville's guardhouse. She can set your default respawn point to Edgeville, for a large fee.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • According to Mod Ash in a Q&A stream, Krystilia was initially going to be named Kystrilia, but due to "Kys" being the first three letters, they decided to relocate the R.[confirmation needed]

[[File:Krystilia chathead.png|left]]
'''Krystilia''' is a [[Slayer master]] found in [[Edgeville]]'s jail north-east of the [[bank]]. When spoken to, she expresses her love for [[magic]] and the Wilderness, and claims the guards locked her in the cell for trouble-making.

Players can speak to her to change their [[respawn]] point to Edgeville, after unlocking the feature for a one-time fee of 5,000,000 [[coins]].

==Slayer==
She is a Slayer master who assigns the player [[monsters]] found within the [[Wilderness]]. '''Only''' kills within the Wilderness count towards her tasks. Before being assigned a Wilderness task, she will warn you that she will assign '''any''' monster regardless of your combat level.

In addition to this, killing monsters on her tasks can yield [[Larran's key]], which can be used to open Larran's [[Larran's small chest|small]] or [[Larran's big chest|big chest]], also found in the Wilderness. They act similarly to [[Konar quo Maten]]'s [[brimstone key]]s and [[brimstone chest]].

Tasks from Krystilia have a separate task completion counter to standard tasks. Players will have to complete a five [[Slayer task]] streak from her to begin earning [[Slayer reward points]] from Wilderness slayer tasks. Although they are counted separately, players cannot have a regular and Wilderness slayer task at the same time. If players do not want to do one of her tasks, they can speak to [[Turael]] in [[Burthorpe]] to have him give them another task; however, doing so will '''reset''' the player's Wilderness task streak (but not their normal Slayer task streak).

For a kill to count towards a Krystilia task, the player must be physically located inside the Wilderness when the monster's death occurs. A player who is using a [[Dwarf multicannon]] will receive the standard "As your slayer task is from Krystilia, you can only perform it inside the Wilderness" message if they teleport out of the Wilderness to restock and remain outside of it when their cannon kills the monster. The safe zone buffer immediately outside the [[Ferox Enclave]] counts as the Wilderness for task purposes, but the Enclave itself does not. Thus a player using the [[Pool of Refreshment]] to resupply will not receive credit for the kill if they are inside the Enclave. 

Completion of a task assigned by Krystilia '''after the 5th task streak''' will grant:

Monsters assigned by Krystilia have a chance to drop [[Larran's key]]s and [[Slayer's enchantment]]s, which can be used to upgrade the [[Slayer's staff]] to a [[Slayer's staff (e)]].

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 9 February 2022
|update = Land of the Goblins
|poll = 
|change = Increased the weighting of the new Wilderness Slayer tasks from 3 to 5.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 2 February 2022
|update = Revenant Maledictus & Wilderness Changes
|poll = 
|change = * Krystilia now assigns Abyssal Demons (75-125), Dust Devils (75-125), Jellies (100-150), and Nechryael (75-125)
* Fire Giant task reduced from 100-150 to 75-125.
* Hill Giant task reduced from 100-150 to 75-125.
* Bloodveld task reduced from 90-140 to 70-110.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 18 June 2020
|update = Poll 71 and Darkmeyer Updates
|change = The number of black knights north of Venenatis were increased from 2 to 7 and the number of bloodveld spawns in the Wilderness Dungeon were increased from 2 to 5.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 30 April 2020
|update = Poll 70 and Bounty Hunter Changes
|change = Bloodvelds, hill giants, moss giants, black knights, pirates and zombies were added to her list of tasks.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 25 January 2018
|update = Barbarian Assault Ranged Rework
|change = [[Lesser demon]]s were added to her list of tasks, as was previously stated in the newspost where she became a Slayer master.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 23 November 2017
|update = Mage Arena II, Revenant Caves & Deadman Beta
|change = [[Chaos druid]]s were added to her list of tasks, as was previously stated in the newspost where she became a Slayer master.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 13 April 2017
|update = Wilderness Slayer
|change = Krystilia was made into a [[Slayer master]] and she was given a name. Previously, she was simply known as "Witch".
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 11 July 2013
|poll = Old School feature poll 6 - Castle Wars, etc.
|update = Patch Notes (11 July 2013)
|change = A witch has been added in Edgeville's guardhouse. She can set your default respawn point to Edgeville, for a large fee.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
* According to Mod Ash in a Q&A stream, Krystilia was initially going to be named Kystrilia, but due to "[https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/KYS Kys]" being the first three letters, they decided to relocate the R.{{fact}}
